RelatedSentence: Apple 's new retail leader Angela Ahrendts has been meeting with employees and managers at Apple 's stores , according to a new report from Mark Gurman at 9to5Mac .
And so far , employees seem to love her .
One manager told Gurman , Even over the phone , you feel like you are speaking to her as she is sitting right next to you .

A1: like you are speaking to her
